meanings.definition: A fungal infection of the skin or nails.
meanings.sent1: Tinea can cause red, itchy patches on the skin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe antifungal creams for tinea infections.
meanings.sent3: The tinea on my foot decided to throw a party and invite all its fungal friends.
meanings.sent4: The tinea spread like wildfire through the damp, warm environment of the locker room.
meanings.sent5: The tinea infection on her nails looked like tiny white moons against the pink skin.

meanings.definition: A genus of fungi that includes various parasitic species.
meanings.sent1: Researchers study tinea to understand its different species.
meanings.sent2: Tinea fungi can be found in various environments around the world.
meanings.sent3: The tinea genus had a family reunion to discuss their parasitic adventures.
meanings.sent4: The tinea fungi in the forest formed a magical circle of growth and decay.
meanings.sent5: The tinea genus was like a hidden kingdom of tiny, unseen rulers in the world of fungi.

meanings.definition: A skin infection caused by a fungus.
meanings.sent1: She visited the doctor to treat the tinea on her skin.
meanings.sent2: Tinea is common in warm and moist areas of the body.
meanings.sent3: The tinea on his arm seemed to be having a dance party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The tinea infection crept across her skin like a silent intruder in the night.
meanings.sent5: The tinea fungus on his skin looked like a tiny forest of mischief and mayhem.
